title: Angels in Harmony
description: An illustrated companion to the Threshold Series by Christa Kinde. Angels have alwaysserved in pairs, but Baird is sure there must be some mistake when Kester shows up on his doorstep. The vividly energetic redhead couldnâ€™t have been more different from his genteel new apprentice. Yet their rocky beginnings give way to a unique balance, proving that friendship can flourish in the unlikeliest of places, given time, trust, and the Twelve Days of Christmas.
author: Christa Kinde
